about_the_company: Schweitzer Engineering Laboratories (SEL) is a company focused on infrastructure defense and cybersecurity in the power engineering community. They offer competitive pay, superior benefits, and a strong emphasis on employee growth and development.
job_responsibilities: Lead a team in conducting white and black box testing of devices and software for security flaws and vulnerabilities.
Identify areas of concern and provide recommendations for improved cybersecurity.
Stay up to date and train others about current security vulnerabilities and mitigation processes.
Lead the specification, design, implementation, and testing of firmware/software systems.
Understand hardware and software interactions and collaborate with Hardware Engineers.
Lead the development of designs and test documentation.
Mentor Engineers, Associate Engineers, and Technicians.
required_education: B.S. in Electrical Engineering, Computer Science, Cybersecurity, Information Technology, Software Engineering, Information Systems, Computer Engineering, or equivalent
